description: A bootleg duplicate of the Rivtech 8x40mm caseless round.

//: Cased ammo tends to be roughly $1/shot, more or less.  Rivtech ammo, being New and Proprietary and Expensive, $2-2.50 or so.
description: An 8x40mm caseless round, loaded with a 127gr full metal jacket bullet. The box shaped body of this cartridge doubles as its propellant.  Proprietary ammunition for Rivtech firearms.

//: Better profit margins if they're making the same propellant body for the entire range, so this got turned into frangible.
description: An 8x40mm caseless round, loaded with an 83gr lead free bullet.  The copper and polymer frangible bullet reduces overpentration, ricochet and splashback risks, allowing for safer training at closer ranges. The box shaped body of this cartridge doubles as its propellant.  Proprietary ammunition for Rivtech firearms.

An 8x40mm caseless round, loaded with a 114gr full metal jacket mild steel core bullet.  The box shaped body of this cartridge doubles as its propellant.  Military grade ammunition for Rivtech firearms.

An 8x40mm caseless round, loaded with a 114gr Advanced Armor Piercing bullet, featuring a tungsten penetrator enclosed within a reverse drawn copper bullet.  The box shaped body of this cartridge doubles as its propellant.  Military grade ammunition for Rivtech firearms.

An 8x40mm caseless round, loaded with a 114gr full metal jacket tracer bullet to help keep the weapon they are fired from on target.  The box shaped body of this cartridge doubles as its propellant.  Military grade ammunition for Rivtech firearms.  Tracers have the potential to ignite flammable substances at their point of impact.

An 8x40mm caseless round loaded with a 180gr Nosler Partition bullet.  The bullet separates two lead cores with its copper jacket, promising both expansion and deep penetration in heavy game.  The box shaped body of this cartridge doubles as its propellant.  Military grade ammunition for Rivtech firearms.
